title: Introduction to Programming with Python
description: A beginner-friendly course introducing the fundamentals of programming using Python. You'll learn variables, conditionals, loops, and functions while building small projects.
timeline: 3-9 hours per week, but can be done at your own pace. Recorded lessons & projects

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python
description: Dive into the basics of AI, including search algorithms, knowledge representation, and neural networks—all through Python. Best suited for learners with some prior coding experience. [AI GENERATED]
timeline: 10-30 hours per week, but can be done at your own pace. Recorded lessons & projects

title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Explore the core principles of cybersecurity, from cryptography to network threats. No prior experience needed—perfect for beginners interested in online safety and security careers. [AI GENERATED]
timeline: 2-6 hours per week, but can be done at your own pace. Recorded lessons & projects

title: Introduction to Data Science with Python
